name: .CONTI File Extension
summary: Learn about .CONTI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Since CONTI files are encrypted with advanced encryption, you cannot open them by simply changing the .conti file extension back to the original extension. Currently, there is no program available to effectively restore infected files.
If you have a recent backup of your files, you can perform a system restore to remove the virus, but any changes made to files after the backup was made will be lost.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
